title: All my Friends are Dead
content:
Hey there.. I'm looking for the typeface  
used on the album cover to 'All my friends are dead'.

Another example of a similar style I'm looking for is on the book cover to 'The Heart Keeper'.

I havn't yet been able to find either in my academy's library.

I don't know if there are many free typefaces like this but anything in the right direction would be appreciated!

Thanks, O

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [105815.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123033734/http:/typophile.com/files/105815.jpg) | 48.04 KB |
| [n213250.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123033734/http:/typophile.com/files/n213250.jpg) | 25.4 KB |
author: s7409651

comments.content: Bookman with swash (not ITC version) for ‘’All my friends are dead’. Try [Jukebox Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123033734/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000085).
